schema.description: 查询的设备品牌名称，支持模糊查询。

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "9c7a3b09-a69a-43f5-8bf2-84f7119810eb",
  "DeviceBrands": [
    {
      "Manufacture": "SAIC",
      "DeviceBrandId": 1,
      "Description": "荣威\t",
      "DeviceBrand": "ROEWE",
      "ProjectId": "projectTest"
    }
  ]
}","errorExample":"{
  "Code":"NoPermissionToAccessProject",
  "HostId":"iovcc.cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com",
  "Message":"User is not authorized to access the specified project.",
  "RequestId":"6F25F67C-F411-499F-BCE2-67CA563CB064"
}"},{"type":"xml","example":"<ListDeviceBrandsResponse>
	<DeviceBrands>
		<Description>荣威</Description>
		<DeviceBrand>ROEWE</DeviceBrand>
		<DeviceBrandId>1</DeviceBrandId>
		<Manufacture>SAIC</Manufacture>
		<ProjectId>projectTest</ProjectId>
	</DeviceBrands>
	<RequestId>E94C9864-56FB-44AD-AC0C-A1CEFB332254</RequestId>
</ListDeviceBrandsResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询获取品牌列表
summary: 根据品牌ID或根据品牌名称，模糊查询获取品牌列表。
